title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2811.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2811.1 - General

State Regulations

The applicant must: (a) be a bona fide organization in existence
either as a corporation or unincorporated, organized group performing
significant housing preservation and community renewal activities for at least
one full year prior to entering into a contract with the
commissioner; (b) demonstrate by
its immediate past and current activities that it has the ability to preserve, repair, maintain, renovate, rehabilitate, manage or operate housing
accommodations or to engage in other housing preservation and community renewal
activities in the region; (c) demonstrate that the housing preservation and community renewal activities
which are to be performed pursuant to the proposed contract with the
commissioner are needed by the region; (d) possess or have the ability to acquire or
gain access to the requisite staff, office facilities, equipment and expertise
to enable it to perform the proposed activities. The office shall be located
within the region and shall be open during regular business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2811.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
